bwwExcerpt: The Shirelles, one of the greatest girl groups of all time (heck, they were covered by the Beatles), get a show of such total ineptitude and cynical profiteering that your mouth pretty much dangles open in disbelief for the duration of the entire tawdry proceedings...At least designer David H. Lawrence's parade of ever-changing hair gives you something to watch.
